attributes.action: Cancel the 14 day quarantine from the Canary Island's and Balearics.
attributes.additional_details:
The new restriction will leave the British public out of pocket.
Holiday companies are not changing dates due to the Islands not been deemed ‘essential travel only’. This is leaving people in a position where they do not go on their holiday,  resulting in cancellation fees and loss of monies. Or to quarantine with unpaid leave for 14 days, leaving families facing hardship on return from their holiday’s. Some children possibly missing out on the return to school. 
Not to mention employers who may not approve 14 days leave.
attributes.background: Scrap the mandatory 14 day quarantine that has been imposed if returning from Spanish islands of Canaries and Balearics.
